description: Restore visibility and safety with our professional auto glass services. From small chip repairs to complete windshield replacement, our certified technicians handle all auto glass needs. Mobile service available - we come to your location to minimize disruption to your day.
whatToExpect: Our technician assesses the damage and determines if repair or replacement is needed. Chips and small cracks can often be repaired in 30 minutes. Replacement takes 1-2 hours, with a curing period before driving. We handle insurance paperwork if applicable.

faqs.question: Can chips and cracks be repaired?
faqs.answer: Small chips (smaller than a coin) and cracks under 6 inches can usually be repaired. Larger damage, cracks in the driver's line of sight, or damage at the windshield edge typically require replacement.

faqs.question: How long until I can drive after replacement?
faqs.answer: After windshield replacement, we recommend waiting at least 1 hour before driving to allow the adhesive to cure. Full cure takes 24-48 hours; avoid car washes and rough roads during this time.

faqs.question: Do you work with insurance companies?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work directly with major insurance companies. We handle the paperwork and can often bill your insurer directly. Comprehensive coverage usually includes glass repair/replacement.

faqs.question: What glass do you use?
faqs.answer: We offer both OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) and quality aftermarket glass. OEM matches factory specifications; aftermarket provides cost savings while meeting safety standards.

faqs.question: Can you replace side and rear windows?
faqs.answer: Yes, we replace all auto glass including side windows, rear windows, and quarter glass. For specialized glass with sensors or heating elements, we ensure proper functionality.
